arts.ttl: Official: Real Madrid squad list to face Valencia | La Liga MD 11
arts.sum: Real Madrid will be gunning to secure another win and extend their lead at the top of the La Liga standings when they take on Valencia on Saturday night. Ahead of the clash at the Santiago Bernabeu, manager Xabi Alonso has announced the squad list of players available at his disposal for selection. arts.ttl: Transcript: Xabi Alonso’s Pre-Match Press Conference Ahead of Real Madrid vs Valencia in La Liga
arts.sum: "After a very positive week, we have another demanding one coming up, with two La Liga matches, starting against Valencia, and a Champions League visit. Head coach Xabi Alonso is coming off his first statement win at Real, beating Barcelona in the El Clasico.

arts.ttl: Alonso talks Vinicius, Mbappe, Camavinga, Carvajal, Endrick ahead of Real Madrid vs Valencia
arts.sum: Following their El Clasico triumph, Real Madrid return to action on Saturday night as they host Valencia in La Liga, hoping to further stretch their lead at the top.
